metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9445 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
In the Android kernel in F2FS driver there is a possible out of bounds readdue to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local informationdisclosure with system execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9445` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-118.119
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-118.119
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-118.119
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-118.119
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-118.119
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.3.0-26-generic - 5.3.0-26.28~18.04.1

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-118.119').
